[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@influxdata/influxdb-client-apis](./influxdb-client-apis.md) &gt; [Duration](./influxdb-client-apis.duration.md)

## Duration interface

A pair consisting of length of time and the unit of time measured. It is the atomic unit from which all duration literals are composed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface Duration 
```
